Detailed Description

A class for outputting BoxLevel.

To use, see BoxLevel::format() and BoxLevel::formatStatistics().

This class simplifies the insertion of a BoxLevel into a stream while letting the user control how the BoxLevel is formatted for output.

Each Outputter is a light-weight object constructed with a BoxLevel and output parameters. The Outputter is capable of outputting its BoxLevel, formatted according to the parameters.
